original_title: Do You Want Horsegirl or Do You Want the Truth?
overview: "Do You Want Horsegirl or Do You Want the Truth" is a video document capturing the thriving youth scene in Chicago. Featuring live performances from Horsegirl at their sold-out Thalia Hall show alongside other Chicago bands Lifeguard, Friko, and Post Office Winter.
title: Do You Want Horsegirl or Do You Want the Truth?
